quote: Ask clients why they chose you to reinforce their decision and strengthen your relationship.
why_clipworthy: This tactic can immediately improve client interactions and close rates.
suggested_hook: Want to close more deals? Here's a simple question to ask at every listing appointment.

quote: I may not be the right agent for you, and that's okay.
why_clipworthy: This challenges the fear of losing clients by emphasizing the importance of fit.
suggested_hook: Why being selective with clients can actually boost your business.
